text: Loxopholis ioanna is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Colombia. ==References== Category:Loxopholis Category:Reptiles of Colombia Category:Endemic fauna of Colombia Category:Reptiles described in 1971 Category:Taxa named by Thomas Marshall Uzzell, Jr. Category:Taxa named by John C. Barry
title: Loxopholis ioanna
